Hi Jim,

I would suggest combining Mock Objects with unit
testing (jUnit).
Have a look at the mock object site
(http://www.mockobjects.com/) for the whole thing.
An easy to use implementation is the EasyMock
implementation but i think it won't convene to your
case. The reason for which i'm bringing up easy mock
is because it's easy to use and hence an excellent
starting point for mock object testing :o)
You can find EasyMock here: http://www.easymock.org/

Regards,

Blue.

--- cdtmp <jyahoogroups@...> wrote:
